content:
Based on the execution logs and entity data, I'll generate a report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Production Line
Consists of three stone furnaces in a row:
- Furnace 1 at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 3 at position (4.0, 4.0)
All furnaces are working with coal fuel and processing copper ore into copper plates

### Copper Cable Assembly Line
Located around position (9.5, 11.5), consists of:
- Assembling machine for producing copper cable
- Input chest at (6.5, 11.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Output burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving products to storage
- Storage chest at (12.5, 11.5) containing finished products
Additional storage chests at (14.5, 11.5) and (16.5, 11.5) containing iron plates

### Power Generation System
Located around position (-7.0, 24.5), consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) providing water
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (-3.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Research Facility
Located around position (0.5, 28.5), consists of:
- Lab conducting electronics research
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5) feeding science packs
- Storage chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to extract non-existent items
- Verify items are actually present in the assembling machine before attempting extraction
- Check assembling machine status and inventory before extraction attempts

### Resource shortage errors
- Monitor assembling machine ingredient levels
- Ensure consistent supply of raw materials (copper plates for copper cable production)

### Entity interaction errors
- Clear blocked items from ground regularly to prevent interference with operations
- Ensure proper positioning when interacting with entities
